title: Large 2BR/1BA,2BR/1BA,sh Laundry, Pkg Avail(166 Athol #101)
posting_body: Large, ground floor 2BR/2BA apartment in Oakland's Merritt neighborhood.
Floors are easy-to-clean faux hardwood except in tile kitchen and bath.
Huge living room is open to a dining space at one end which connects in turn to the kitchen.
Kitchen includes electric stove and dishwasher.
Master bedroom has its own bath with shower stall.
Second bedroom has a closet with folding mirror doors.
Main bath has a shower stall with sliding glass doors.
Building has shared laundry, an elevator, and parking is available for an additional monthly fee.
It is on a quiet residential street less than a block from Athol Plaza and Lake Merritt, half way down the lake on the east side.
Shopping and dining district on East 18th Street is less than a block away.
Walk Score is 92, Transit Score is 67.
Bus lines 14, 18, 26, 40 and 840 all within two blocks.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.
